trans-unit.source: Groups a set of ribbon controls into a visual and conceptual unit.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref> class.
Unloads the container for the specified item.
This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition> contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*> dependency property.
To be added.
Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> object.
A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
The item to test.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlGroupAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup> to display <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl> items.
The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
